issue.title: [C++] Support nested dictionaries in JSON integration format
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7778](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7778). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `generate_nested_dictionary_case` is disabled for all library implementations. We support dictionaries-within-dictionaries in IPC (I believe) and so need to integration test this

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7778?focusedCommentId=17031374) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Hmm, do you mean dictionaries where the value type is itself a dictionary type? I thought that was forbidden?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7778?focusedCommentId=17031705) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
No, it is permitted.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7778?focusedCommentId=17115452) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7216
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7216>
